title: [Gameplay] Syndra's upgraded Q blast no longer has the red-tint from Transcendent.
body: Pretty much what it says. Upgrade her Q to Rank 5, the blast zone around new dark spheres is the standard purple, not red-purple it was pre-6.9.

replies.body:
Hey Overlord Forte - 

Thanks for the update! We're currently in the process of looking into this. ^-^

Thank you~

Do you know if Syndra's desync animation (walking normally, walking after she uses her ultimate, etc) is on record or not? Ququroon mentioned looking into it a couple months ago and I have no idea what happened with that ... It got worse this patch, but I dunno if I should keep reporting it.

I can get you video recordings and the like if you need them.
Looks like you caught up with Ququroon (poked him this morning). Lemme know if you need anything from me! :)
